name: Sky hurricanes
description:
Take on the role of an elite pilot who controls the most advanced aircraft in the world.
Your task is to overcome nine levels at which you will be met by many opponents.
You will be confronted by unmanned flying drones, helicopters, airplanes, air mines ...
The commanders-in-chief, who will try to destroy you on their flying means, are also of great danger.
Pick up weapons and upgrades for your aircraft. You have access to the power shield, which is able to repel most of the enemy’s attacks.
All in your hands!


Features:
-Various enemies
-Dynamic gameplay
-9 levels
-Difficult gameplay
